ensg.eu.project.enveloppes

Class JarvisConvexHull

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.Envelope
      • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.ConvexHull
        • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.JarvisConvexHull
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEnvelope

    public class JarvisConvexHull
extends ConvexHull
    This class compute the convex hull of a set of points using Jarvis's algorithm (Gift wrapping)
    Author:
    Aiman R'KYEK

      • getEnvelope

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon getEnvelope(java.util.List<Point> pointsList)
        This function return a polygon as the convex hull of a list of points
        Parameters:
        pointsList - List of point of type Point
        Returns:
        return a polygon of the convex hull of the pointsList
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - In case there's less than 3 points in the list of points

      • triplePointDirection

        public int triplePointDirection(Point p1,
                                Point p2,
                                Point p3)
        This function compute the type of the orientation between 3 points
        Parameters:
        p1 - first point
        p2 - second point
        p3 - third point
        Returns:
        0 if the orientation is collinear, 1 if it clockwise and 2 if it counterclockwise
